channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie and her new powers in 'Mighty Pups Stop the Mighty Queen', then in 'Mighty Pups Stop the Hiccups', Nano gets the hiccups and duplicates. (S10, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Flying on Holiday: The Pig family are preparing to go on holiday, Peppa and George pack their favourite toys and Granny and Grandpa are left to look after Goldie the Fish.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday House: Peppa and her family have landed in Italy, where they discover another language. Daddy Pig finds driving hard. Peppa rings Granny and Grandpa Pig to check on Goldie the Fish.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Holiday in the Sun; End of the Holiday: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Curry's favourite radio show is cancelled in 'Paddington's Radio Show', then in 'Paddington's Butler', Mr. Curry is Paddington's butler for the day - but he prefers giving orders! (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: It's the Windsor Gardens pet show in 'Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge', and in 'Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis', playing with neighbours is more fun than trying to outdo them! (S2, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Rocket: After seeing a toy Elf rocket, the King orders a real rocket to fly to the moon. Elf honour is at stake and the Elves make a rocket in record time! (Part 1 of 2).
